author: struberg
msg: upgrade to 1.0 final versions of some specs
In other words: ditch all alpha versions and use the 'real' ones

author: jacopoc
msg: Fix for bug reported by Eric de Maulde in OFBIZ-5035: character encoding issue happening in the ecommerce application; the issue was caused by the CatalogUrlFilter and ContentUrlFilter because, under special conditions, they are preventing the ContextFilter (where encoding is set) to be executed.

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1672427
Updated ant target to use the new commons-codec jar.
